DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study examine efficacy , safety tolerability intranasal oxytocin novel treatment Phelan-McDermid syndrome ( PMS ) . This study utilize randomize , placebo-controlled design 12 week ( phase 1 ) , follow open-label extension 12 week ( phase 2 ) . The purpose evaluate effect intranasal oxytocin impairment attention , social memory , socialization , language , repetitive behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Piloting Treatment With Intranasal Oxytocin Phelan-McDermid Syndrome
